acts.name: Lioneye's Watch
acts.flavourText: Cold, dank and reeking of infection. That's how Hope fares in Wraeclast.

acts.name: The Twilight Strand
acts.flavourText: Hope was drowned here.

acts.name: The Coast
acts.flavourText: The cliffs echo the hungry madness.

acts.name: The Tidal Island
acts.flavourText: Despite the warming sun, the breeze here bites with fangs of ice.

acts.name: The Mud Flats
acts.flavourText: Mud and air seethes with warped life.

acts.name: The Fetid Pool
acts.flavourText: Sluggish waters simmering with decay.

acts.name: The Flooded Depths
acts.flavourText: Darkness chilled into stillness.

acts.name: The Submerged Passage
acts.flavourText: Slime, shadow, and sharp sharp teeth.

acts.name: The Ledge
acts.flavourText: Dusty winds laden with the scent of bone, old and otherwise.

acts.name: The Climb
acts.flavourText: The cliffs glower down like judges in session.

acts.name: The Lower Prison
acts.flavourText: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

acts.name: The Upper Prison
acts.flavourText: The air is rich with despair and apparition.

acts.name: Prisoner's Gate
acts.flavourText: The cliffs watch with goatish eyes.

acts.name: The Ship Graveyard
acts.flavourText: Whispered agonies of the marooned dead.

acts.name: The Ship Graveyard Cave
acts.flavourText: A corpse's throat, exhaling death.

acts.name: The Cavern of Wrath
acts.flavourText: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

acts.name: The Cavern of Anger
acts.flavourText: The air needles the skin with its frigid fury.

acts.name: The Forest Encampment
acts.flavourText: A remnant of civility in the wild.

acts.name: The Southern Forest
acts.flavourText: Lush and humid, sweating violence.

acts.name: The Old Fields
acts.flavourText: Sick pastures, feverish to the touch.

acts.name: The Den
acts.flavourText: Hot and sour as the panting of a rabid bear.

acts.name: The Crossroads
acts.flavourText: Life struggles where once it bloomed.

acts.name: The Crypt Level 1
acts.flavourText: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

acts.name: The Crypt Level 2
acts.flavourText: Stones worn smooth by centuries of devotion.

acts.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
acts.flavourText: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

acts.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
acts.flavourText: Phantom whispers of maniacal passion.

acts.name: The Broken Bridge
acts.flavourText: A pure, soothing river once red and clogged with the victims of war.

acts.name: The Riverways
acts.flavourText: Once tamed rivers now running free.

acts.name: The Northern Forest
acts.flavourText: Daylight is the exile here.

acts.name: The Western Forest
acts.flavourText: Bathed in the cool light of obsession.

acts.name: The Weaver's Chambers
acts.flavourText: Shrouded in mourning silks.

acts.name: The Vaal Ruins
acts.flavourText: Shades scratching at imprisoning stone.

acts.name: The Wetlands
acts.flavourText: Corrupted waters, pouring from the Mantle above.

acts.name: The Dread Thicket
acts.flavourText: Unfettered nature. Unchained ferocity.

acts.name: The Caverns
acts.flavourText: Two thousand years of regret.

acts.name: The Ancient Pyramid
acts.flavourText: Two thousand years of regret.

acts.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
acts.flavourText: The ground aches with desecration. The rain tastes of blight.

acts.name: The Sarn Encampment
acts.flavourText: The forging ground of heroes, past and present.

acts.name: The City of Sarn
acts.flavourText: A harsh light on harsh sights.

acts.name: The Slums
acts.flavourText: Only the wind whistles and whines here now.

acts.name: The Crematorium
acts.flavourText: Choked with ash and cinder.

acts.name: The Marketplace
acts.flavourText: All the money in the world can't stop a world from ending.

acts.name: The Catacombs
acts.flavourText: Coughing up the dust of dead devotion.

acts.name: The Battlefront
acts.flavourText: Charred flesh and spilled bowels. Sweet and sour.

acts.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
acts.flavourText: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

acts.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
acts.flavourText: An empire at its height, reflected in polished gold.

acts.name: The Docks
acts.flavourText: Life pales in the wake of progress.

acts.name: The Sewers
acts.flavourText: What horrors lurk in the bowels of the city?

acts.name: The Ebony Barracks
acts.flavourText: Polished surfaces reflect brutal efficiency.

acts.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
acts.flavourText: Depravity is boundless.

acts.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
acts.flavourText: Depravity is boundless.

acts.name: The Imperial Gardens
acts.flavourText: Nature outgrows the designs of Man.

acts.name: The Library
acts.flavourText: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

acts.name: The Archives
acts.flavourText: All the knowledge in the Empire could not save them.

acts.name: The Sceptre of God
acts.flavourText: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

acts.name: The Upper Sceptre of God
acts.flavourText: The pinnacle of power. The height of hubris.

acts.name: Highgate
acts.flavourText: A frail scab of hope holds Nightmare at bay.

acts.name: The Aqueduct
acts.flavourText: The rushing lifeblood of a long-dead Empire.

acts.name: The Dried Lake
acts.flavourText: Bones of betrayal, ashes of purity.

acts.name: The Mines Level 1
acts.flavourText: Disease in the darkness.

acts.name: The Mines Level 2
acts.flavourText: Disease in the darkness.

acts.name: The Crystal Veins
acts.flavourText: Gifts of the Beast, awaiting plunder.

acts.name: Kaom's Dream
acts.flavourText: Fury and flame come to life.

acts.name: Kaom's Stronghold
acts.flavourText: A holdfast built of hubris.

acts.name: Daresso's Dream
acts.flavourText: No matter how far you climb, you never escape the Pits.

acts.name: The Grand Arena
acts.flavourText: Dripping blood and weeping flowers.

acts.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
acts.flavourText: Enter the Nightmare.

acts.name: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
acts.flavourText: Enter the Nightmare.

acts.name: The Harvest
acts.flavourText: Where dreams come to die.

acts.name: The Ascent
acts.flavourText: The greater the rise, the greater the fall.

acts.name: Overseer's Tower
acts.flavourText: Vengeance is the slave's ultimate reward.

acts.name: The Slave Pens
acts.flavourText: In Oriath's darkest corner, the spark of rebellion ignites.

acts.name: The Control Blocks
acts.flavourText: The illusion of control is swiftly severed by the blade of reality.

acts.name: Oriath Square
acts.flavourText: What was once the heart of the city is now the heart of the battle.

acts.name: The Ruined Square
acts.flavourText: Oriath's bleeding heart is the main course in a terrible feast.

acts.name: The Templar Courts
acts.flavourText: Only those with faithful eyes may enter these solemn chambers unbidden.

acts.name: The Torched Courts
acts.flavourText: Fuelled by blood and chaos, a dark inferno engulfs the halls of justice.

acts.name: The Chamber of Innocence
acts.flavourText: In this holiest of sanctums, the High Templar communes with God and delivers His divine judgement.

acts.name: The Ossuary
acts.flavourText: The faithful dead watch over the city with hollow eyes.

acts.name: The Reliquary
acts.flavourText: A trove of shameful relics displayed with pride.

acts.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
acts.flavourText: Atop this burning monument to arrogance, Oriath's final hope remains.

acts.name: Lioneye's Watch
acts.flavourText: The shivering tides bring little hope, only desperation and despair.

acts.name: The Twilight Strand
acts.flavourText: Those that now wash ashore seek no warmth or shelter, only to fill a bottomless void of pain and hunger.

acts.name: The Coast
acts.flavourText: The Ancestors return to conquer these shores once again.

acts.name: The Tidal Island
acts.flavourText: As the tide rises, hope is drowned.

acts.name: The Mud Flats
acts.flavourText: Mud and blood make a fine war paint.

acts.name: The Karui Fortress
acts.flavourText: The waters here, once stagnant and foul, now run clear with an ancient bloodlust.

acts.name: The Ridge
acts.flavourText: The air is thin, the way is narrow.

acts.name: The Lower Prison
acts.flavourText: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

acts.name: Shavronne's Tower
acts.flavourText: Echoes of the past bring new life to an old experiment.

acts.name: Prisoner's Gate
acts.flavourText: The hunting grounds of a cloven god.

acts.name: The Western Forest
acts.flavourText: What madness flitters and creeps through the darkened trees?

acts.name: The Riverways
acts.flavourText: These violent waters carry portents of death.

acts.name: The Wetlands
acts.flavourText: A corpulent grub flails mindlessly, infesting the putrescent muck.

acts.name: The Southern Forest
acts.flavourText: Insidious pupa populate under sweltering heat.

acts.name: The Cavern of Anger
acts.flavourText: Stalactites drip in mourning for an ocean queen.

acts.name: The Beacon
acts.flavourText: An echo of destiny consumes the land.

acts.name: The Brine King's Reef
acts.flavourText: A coral throne for a salt-soured god.

acts.name: The Bridge Encampment
acts.flavourText: Surviving rodents cling tight to cracks found in the masonry.

acts.name: The Broken Bridge
acts.flavourText: The stonework trembles atop this petrified land.

acts.name: The Crossroads
acts.flavourText: Ancient cruelty tears through the cobbled intersection.

acts.name: The Fellshrine Ruins
acts.flavourText: A spirit of sadism blemishes the earth.

acts.name: The Crypt
acts.flavourText: Ancestral memories given life, then soured.

acts.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 1
acts.flavourText: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

acts.name: The Chamber of Sins Level 2
acts.flavourText: Decrepit ruins born again. A lusting evil stalks its halls.

acts.name: Maligaro's Sanctum
acts.flavourText: The inner depths of decadent darkness.

acts.name: The Den
acts.flavourText: Sodden spores flourish and feast on decaying flesh.

acts.name: The Ashen Fields
acts.flavourText: Scorched earth and slumbering cinder.

acts.name: The Northern Forest
acts.flavourText: Wooden sentinels tower above.

acts.name: The Dread Thicket
acts.flavourText: Dripping with anger and grief, the ancient thicket weeps.

acts.name: The Causeway
acts.flavourText: Primordial ruins guard antiquarian secrets.

acts.name: The Vaal City
acts.flavourText: Ancient and arcane, a civilisation lost to the dust of history.

acts.name: The Temple of Decay Level 1
acts.flavourText: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

acts.name: The Temple of Decay Level 2
acts.flavourText: Arachnoid servants dribble and drool, coveting pilgrim flesh to feed abhorrent desires.

acts.name: The Sarn Ramparts
acts.flavourText: A parapet shakes beneath a billowing sky.

acts.name: The Sarn Encampment
acts.flavourText: A shaky peace descends, though swords will never rest.

acts.name: The Toxic Conduits
acts.flavourText: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

acts.name: Doedre's Cesspool
acts.flavourText: Spells of blood foul the waters below.

acts.name: The Grand Promenade
acts.flavourText: A favourite walk of noble lords, now fallen into disrepair.

acts.name: The High Gardens
acts.flavourText: Creeping dread chokes life from this thriving terrace.

acts.name: The Bath House
acts.flavourText: Hidden sin where revelry thrives.

acts.name: The Lunaris Concourse
acts.flavourText: Allegiances falter like the waning of the moon.

acts.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 1
acts.flavourText: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

acts.name: The Lunaris Temple Level 2
acts.flavourText: Gibbous beauty eclipsed by a sisters' feud.

acts.name: The Quay
acts.flavourText: The restless dead shift 'neath darkened waters.

acts.name: The Grain Gate
acts.flavourText: A barrier trembles before undying feet.

acts.name: The Imperial Fields
acts.flavourText: The savagery of war stains both muck and mire.

acts.name: The Solaris Concourse
acts.flavourText: Conquered by the fog of war.

acts.name: The Solaris Temple Level 1
acts.flavourText: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

acts.name: The Solaris Temple Level 2
acts.flavourText: Luminary flares extinguished by burning pride.

acts.name: The Harbour Bridge
acts.flavourText: A dark unrest sends ribbons to war.

acts.name: The Blood Aqueduct
acts.flavourText: A mighty spillway tainted by tarrish blacks and sanguine reds.

acts.name: Highgate
acts.flavourText: Survivors huddle 'neath baleful shadows of rot and decay.

acts.name: The Descent
acts.flavourText: A freezing drop to test one's resolve.

acts.name: The Vastiri Desert
acts.flavourText: Blustering sand, sharper than a bandit's blade.

acts.name: The Oasis
acts.flavourText: A paradise hidden amongst sunbleached bones and blistering dunes.

acts.name: The Foothills
acts.flavourText: The secrets of history lie hidden among layers of dirt and sand.

acts.name: The Boiling Lake
acts.flavourText: These corrosive waters devour both flesh and bone.

acts.name: The Tunnel
acts.flavourText: Unspeakable horrors filigree and haunt the nameless dark.

acts.name: The Quarry
acts.flavourText: A monstrous terror stalks chthonic mines, yearning for the boundless sky.

acts.name: The Refinery
acts.flavourText: Madness was visited upon those who dug too deep.

acts.name: The Belly of the Beast
acts.flavourText: Once flushed with the warmness of blood, now festering; consumed by fungal rot.

acts.name: The Rotting Core
acts.flavourText: The putrid interior oozes and spoils.

acts.name: Oriath Docks
acts.flavourText: A final refuge, backed hard against the waves of a raging sea.

acts.name: The Cathedral Rooftop
acts.flavourText: From above, the true scope of carnage is clearly espied.

acts.name: The Ravaged Square
acts.flavourText: A flourishing place of trade, barely recognizable amidst the countless deaths.

acts.name: The Torched Courts
acts.flavourText: Pious priests once dealt cruel justice within these halls, now they both smoulder in silent agony.

acts.name: The Desecrated Chambers
acts.flavourText: Mad men toil under smoking skies to pervert a holy sanctum.

acts.name: The Canals
acts.flavourText: A man-made rupture from which both blood and water flow.

acts.name: The Feeding Trough
acts.flavourText: Cries of torment and pathetic moans as the unholy banquet of flesh continues.

acts.name: The Control Blocks
acts.flavourText: Sadists and cut-throats break both bone and brain.

acts.name: The Reliquary
acts.flavourText: Empty, broken shelves linger, looted and forgotten in the wake of this horrid war.

acts.name: The Ossuary
acts.flavourText: The dead offer thanks, for they have been spared this final savagery.
